title: Port Crane Simulation-Based Operator Training Program

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic mechanical operation principles and adaptability to digital simulation environments
context.additional_context: A practice-oriented educational environment utilizing VR and digital simulation equipment, with teachers providing individualized feedback based on learner progress

learning_goals: Perform basic operations of five crane types (Quay-Side Gantry, Rubber Tired Gantry, etc.) in a simulation environment with 80% accuracy.
Successfully perform container loading/unloading tasks in a virtual port environment according to standard procedures (ISO 33021) three times consecutively.
Achieve a 15% improvement in operational efficiency (throughput per unit time) via a simulator evaluation system.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
